revised_title: Researches on the Refraction, Dispersion, and Sensitiveness of Liquids: Part I
tldr: The authors investigate the refraction, dispersion, and sensitiveness of various liquids, discovering a relationship between sensitiveness and the change of volume by heat. They also examine the refractive indices of different liquids and propose the concept of'refractive energy' to represent the influence of a substance on light rays.
